title: The Author Page of Oliver Q. Memphis
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:foxtrot hidetitle=a]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
 --timeDelay: 0.5s;
 --problem: 255, 109, 0
 --grey: 136, 136, 136;
 --head-font: Lexend;
 --page-font-size: 0.9rem
}
[[/module]]

[[module css]]
:root{
  --header-title: "AUTHORPAGE";
  --header-subtitle: "Oliver \"Not Actually From Memphis\" Memphis";
}

div#extra-div-1 {
    background-image: url(http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/olivermemphis2/logoblue.png);
    filter: opacity(100%);
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[div style="text-align:center"]]
Hello.
[[/div]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:betterfootnotes]]


[[=]]
+ if you're here for The Chart, scroll down
++++ (after reading all the other stuff, preferably)
[[/=]]

Person. He/they. English. Keeper of Spreadsheets. Will play tenor saxophone for money. At parties, I stand around awkwardly and occasionally contribute amusing comments. I do the same thing here, except the comments are several thousand words long and only sometimes amusing. Have accidentally ended up as Metafoundation's Henry Beck (see below).

Contact via Discord @misterblue28.

[[table class="table2"]]
[[row]][[hcell]]
+ ARTICLES
[[/hcell]][[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell]]
[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-5243-J]]]: The Vector that Keeps On Vectoring
//"Dr. Blank must open the onsite copy of AssortedArtFuckeryDocument.svg."//

The first thing I ever posted to this site was a joke about [[*user HarryBlank]]'s actual real filing system. I wrote most of it on my phone in the back of a car, Wikidot formatting included. I do not recommend this approach.
[[/=]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell]]
[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-6495]]]: Where We Fall
//"We just thought you might want a reminder every now and then."//

Welcome to the beginning of the end.
[[/=]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell]]
[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-6625]]]: A Medium of Communication
//"Why are we trying to obscure the fact that this thing can turn into a bomb?"//

What happens when you put together a handful of inexplicable items scattered around the world, a dozen senior researchers, the internal politics of a global secret society, and an online comments section? The short answer is, you get a twenty-year-long Wikipedia edit war.
[[/=]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell]]
[[=]]
++ [[[the-fall-of-site-128|The Fall of Site-128]]]
//"Welcome to the first formal meeting of the What-The-Fuck-Is-Happening Society."//

There used to be a place called Site-128. Then it fell apart, and then it stopped existing, and in between those two events was the most interesting week that ever happened there.
[[/=]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell]]
[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-7953]]]: Content, by VKTM
//"Most people's lives are so boring, we have to stuff them full of horrifying bullshit to be remotely worth watching."//

Vikander-Kneed Technical Media is getting into the online streaming business now, apparently. So far, it's been about as ethical and successful as you'd expect.
[[/=]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell]]
[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-8282]]]: You Are Now Entering
//"You have a secret cave with magic minerals in the walls, and you're using that as a shipping warehouse?"//

Sometimes, the Foundation's plans are derailed by grand schemes and conspiracies orchestrated by major Groups of Interest. Sometimes, it's one guy with the moral fibre and consequence-evading ability of L. Ron Hubbard.
[[/=]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell]]
[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-8435]]]: The Law Without Land
//"I have taken the liberty of writing a file for your convenience. Please read it immediately."//

A story about a haunted House, and the dangers of doing magic when you're a shortsighted moron.
[[/=]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

-----

[[=]]
+ Multifoundation/Canonexus Timeline Map
++ [[[https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/not-actually-from-memphis/Multif.svg| Fullsize SVG]]] | [[[https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/not-actually-from-memphis/Multif.png| Fullsize PNG]]]
[[/=]]

[[include component:image-block
    name=Multif.png|
    caption=//Note: Due to obscure and as-yet-unresolved technical issues, the SVG version may fail to render properly on iPhone browsers. If you're experiencing problems, I recommend viewing The Chart on desktop, or using the PNG version as a fallback.//|
    width=120%|
    align=center
]]

-----

[[=]]
+ Colour Reference
[[/=]]

[[include component:image-block
    name=colours.png|
    caption=Accent colours from the ACS bar, the Foxtrot theme, and a handful of other places.|
    width=120%|
    align=center
]]

@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote" style="display:none"]]
++ PERSONNEL FILE
**Name:** Dr. Oliver Q. Memphis
**Security Clearance:** Level 4
**Assignment:** Research Liaison, Site-43
**History:** Joined Site-128 in 2012 as a researcher. Briefly became Site Director in 2016 to oversee the facility's decommissioning, before transferring to Site-43 to help coordinate inter-Site research activities.
[[/div]]
author: OliverMemphis
